# Mentor Review Checklist

- [] Verify all changes are within specific fellow project directory (unless permitted)
- [] Verify correctness of code
- [] Verify code is commented in meaningful way
- [] Verify any github actions complete successfully
- [] Verify code has been tested (manually or adds testing)
- [] Verify merge conflicts are resolved
- [] (Optional) Verify documentation exists
- [] (Optional) Other fellow review of changes

## Adding Github Actions Checklist

- [] New action only triggers when fellow project directory changes
- [] New action executes specifies working-directory as fellow project directory
